level.text: The contracting officer shall ensure that each contractor’s performance is evaluated in accordance with the rules established by the Director in chapter 22 of this title.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1411 (February 26, 1988); as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 9071 (September 27, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11077, 11081 (December 23, 2011).
